channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Economic Consequences of Donald Trump
item.description: America’s highly compromised public finances require that it do everything to promote economic growth to help manage the debt burden.

item.title: Presidents Don’t Run Our Elections
item.description: Donald Trump shouldn’t imitate Joe Biden’s effort to federalize elections.

item.title: Judge dismisses part of lawsuit over 'Alligator Alcatraz' immigration detention center
item.description: A federal judge in Miami issued a split decision in a lawsuit over the legal rights of detainees at the "Alligator Alcatraz" immigration detention cen...

item.title: Is Beto back? Poll shows O'Rourke leads Democratic Senate primary race in Texas
item.description: Beto O'Rourke, the former U.S. House member whose unconventional campaign nearly upset Sen. Ted Cruz in 2018 and set the stage for a presidential bid ...

item.title: The Media’s Ukraine-Wins Fantasy Continues Costing Lives
item.description: Ukrainians may not like the reality of their situation either, but they can't afford to live the same fantasy the media keep trying for.

item.title: Don’t Blame Mail-In Voting
item.description: Instead, make it a priority to take advantage of it, since it’s not going anywhere.

item.title: Amid Endless Streaming Silos, Live Sports Still Attract Millions Of Eyeballs
item.description: Two recent deals demonstrate the immense power of live sports.

item.title: Covid Lockdowns Gave The Next Generation The Worst Personalities Ever
item.description: The Financial Times analyzed data on personality characteristics and the results are grim, especially among the young.

item.title: Police escort Texas Democrats to prevent new redistricting walkout as California moves to retaliate
item.description: Texas Democrats who ended a walkout found themselves shadowed by law enforcement officers to keep them from repeating the protest that stalled Republi...

item.title: Defense Department May Adopt Pro-America Test For K-12 Schools, Military Academies
item.description: This would encourage more traditional, less politicized instruction in military-run public schools and boost recruitment from the most pro-America dem...

item.title: Drop Box Camera Catches Ballot Stuffing In Fraud-Plagued Michigan Town
item.description: Ballot dumps are suspicious. Election law requires ballots be dropped off by the voter, a member of the voter’s family, the voter's household

item.title: Trump's talks with Zelenskyy, European leaders end without security guarantees for Ukraine
item.description: President Trump, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and a group of European leaders were unable to agree on a security guarantee for Ukraine on M...

item.title: The Coming Japanification of Economies
item.description: The dramatic aging of many countries’ populations will present immense economic, political, and social challenges. Market-oriented reforms can help.

item.title: Trump says 'early' arrangements begin for talks between Zelenskyy and Putin
item.description: President Trump said Monday that he began the process for a face-to-face meeting between Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and Russian President...

item.title: Bolivia Is Fed Up with Socialism
item.description: Both presidential candidates who advanced to the runoff promise to undo two decades of leftism.
